item.title: Turn On Your Light
item.description:
Turn On Your Light by undefined Sharon Eubank, First Counselor in the Relief Society General Presidency given in Saturday Morning of 187th Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2017
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Sharon Eubank, First Counselor in the Relief Society General Presidency
